name: Hackathons
subtitle: Organizer, Treasurer, Mentor, Participant
description: Current treasurer of the executive board for Hack.UVA. Handle finances, contact potential sponsors, and organize caterers. Participated in 8 hackathons — PilotDC 2014, PilotDC 2015, HackTJ 2015, HackUMBC 2016, Bitcamp 2016, MLH Prime Spring 2016, YHacks 2016, and MHacks Nano 2017. Mentored 2 middle school hackathons — FirstHack 2016 and HackCL 2016 — leading an App Inventor workshop in HackCL.

name: Natural Language Processing Seminar/Research
subtitle: Student
description: Exploring natural language processing and deep learning with other students. Entails weekly meetings for delving into new papers and technologies. Exploring broader machine learning topics through online lectures (Coursera and Stanford) and python libraries on my own time.

name: Music Program
subtitle: Chief Technology Officer | Principal Trumpet
description: Elected Chief Technology Officer of CSO; developing a website for CSO. Currently play trumpet in the Cavalier Symphony Orchestra (CSO) and the First Year Players pit orchestra. Have played trumpet for ten years now.

name: Rubik's Cube Club
subtitle: Co-President/Team Member
description: Elected co-president as four-year member of the club. Recruited members and managed website and mailing list. Participated on team that solved 25 cubes; broke national record.

name: STEMBassadors
subtitle: Math Tutor
description: Worked on math with Holmes Middle School sixth grade students considered at risk of failing the state mandated math exam.
